entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text:
@narendramodi Dear Prime minister of India. 

My wife working in combodia due to COVID19 all the flight was canceled and not only my spouse's almost more then 100 people over there unfortunately they cant come out from combodia, please help them to bring safer zoon of our country...please
